<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/products"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows you get the list of available products. It shows all available product.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response. Returns a list of product.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"_id":{"type":"string","description":"The unique identifier for the product."},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the product."},"image":{"type":"string","description":"The filename of the product's image."},"price":{"type":"number","format":"float","description":"The price of the product."},"description":{"type":"string","description":"The description of the product."},"soldCount":{"type":"integer","description":"The total number of units sold."},"__v":{"type":"integer","description":"The version of the product. The version increases whenever the product is modified."}},"example":{"_id":"6555a1f49feeac7dccd9b1ee","name":"brown tablede","image":"1700110836527.webp","price":30,"description":"this is a brown table","soldCount":90,"__v":0}}}}}},"400":{"description":"See message description."},"500":{"description":"see message description."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
